about.title: About
description: Over 8 years of experience in data analysis and development. Specializes in building tools for open data visualization and integration. Active member of the OpenGov community since 2019.
Develops solutions to increase transparency of government data and make it more accessible to citizens. Author of several successful public budget visualization projects.

list.title: Budget Portal
list.description: Interactive platform for visualization and analysis of Kazakhstanâ€™s state budget. A tool to improve budget process transparency.

list.title: Open Legal Acts
list.description: System for public discussion of legal acts. Simplifies citizen access to legislative processes.

list.title: Infrastructure Map
list.description: Interactive map of social infrastructure in Kazakhstan cities. Helps citizens locate important sites and assess their availability.

list.title: Procurement Dashboard
list.description: Analytical panel for monitoring public procurement. Ensures process transparency and highlights potential violations.
